title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document all requirements for the cognitive augmentation headset, including desired features, performance specifications, target user groups, and any relevant regulations or standards.

title: Design Hardware Components
description: Design the physical hardware components of the headset, including the neurostimulation circuitry, sensors, user interface, and power management system. Consider safety, ergonomics, and regulatory compliance.

title: Develop Firmware and Software
description: Develop the firmware and software necessary to control the neurostimulation and cognitive enhancement features of the headset.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Design the user interface and overall user experience for the headset, including mobile app or desktop software for configuration, monitoring, and data visualization.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Develop and implement security and privacy measures to protect user data and ensure the safe operation of the neurostimulation technology.

title: Conduct Testing and Validation
description: Develop and execute comprehensive testing plans to validate the functionality, performance, and safety of the cognitive augmentation headset.

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create detailed documentation and user guides for the cognitive augmentation headset, covering installation, configuration, and usage instructions.

title: Implement DevOps and Deployment Processes
description: Set up robust DevOps processes and infrastructure for the efficient building, testing, deployment, and maintenance of the firmware, software, and any associated cloud services or backend components. The focus should be on ensuring continuous integration, delivery, and deployment (CI/CD), using best practices such as containerization, version control, automation, and monitoring tools.
